name: index(of:inSortedRange:options:usingComparator:)
desc: Returns the index, within a specified range, of an object compared with elements in the array using a given NSComparator block.
declaration:
func index(of obj: Any, 
inSortedRange r: NSRange, 
   options opts: NSBinarySearchingOptions = [], 
usingComparator cmp: (Any, Any) -> ComparisonResult) -> Int
